meta.title: LAB SEVEN - Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: No refueling. No noise. More power than a 7000 watt generator. Professional battery power for production.

hero.title: LAB SEVEN
hero.tagline: No refueling. No noise. More power than a 7000 watt generator.
hero.priceText: Available through Anytime Production Equipment Rentals
hero.availability: ONE FREE RENTAL DAY WITH PROMO CODE "241"

overview.title: Turn any outlet into 60A distro
overview.subtitle: Quiet, house-power charging with battery buffering. Plug into a standard 15/20A receptacle, cap the draw, and let the pack cover peaks. Less friction with owners, fewer noise complaints, and a calmer set.

items.title: True 60A Power
items.description: Three 20A Edison on their own circuits, and 1 60A Bates. The only battery with 60A Bates out, no adapters needed.

items.title: Fastest Charging
items.description: Charge one battery in 1 hour using 60A Bates or 4-5 hours using standard 110v

items.title: 7.5kWh Storage
items.description: 1 or 2 batteries solve any problem for HMU, crafty, production, and more

items.title: Use Existing Distro
items.description: Nobody needs to change their workflows - use the same distro boxes you always have

featuresPreview.title: Why production teams choose LAB SEVEN

items.title: Saves money over generators
items.description: When you add fuel runs, fire watch, noise complaints, and slow wrap, generators cost more than the day rate suggests.

items.title: Works everywhere generators can't
items.description: Indoor venues, noise-restricted zones, residential areas, and historic locations that prohibit generators.

items.title: Professional grade reliability
items.description: LFP chemistry, BMS protection, real-time monitoring. Built for the demands of professional production.

solutionsPreview.title: Solutions for every production type
solutionsPreview.subtitle: See how LAB SEVEN solves specific challenges for your role

items.title: Experience Agencies
items.description: Silent power for brand activations and experiential events

items.title: Production Managers
items.description: Efficient, reliable power for streamlined productions

items.title: Gaffers & Lighting
items.description: Power your lighting setups anywhere without generator noise

items.title: Location Managers
items.description: Get venue approval with silent, zero-emission power
